newsitem.title: USA: CBOE, AMEX to list Viasoft options.
newsitem.headline: CBOE, AMEX to list Viasoft options.

text.p: The Chicago Board Options Exchange (CBOE) and the American Stock Exchange (AMEX) said on Monday they would list options on Viasoft Inc on September 23.
Both sets of options will have opening strike prices of 30, 35 and 40 and initial expiration months of October, November, February 1997 and May 1997, the exchanges said separately.
Viasoft shares were up one at 36-3/4 Monday afternoon.

On the CBOE, Viasoft options will trade in the Hewlett-Packard trading crowd. On the AMEX, Susquehanna Investment Group will be the specialist. --Derivatives desk, 312-408-8750/E-mail: derivatives@reuters.com
